Name: sin-naseemismailand-lad
Author: Naseem Ismail And Masoor Maulana, Kaleel

Translations.Text: bhūmiya, taman usuḷāgena siṭina dæya (siyalla piṭataṭa) vīsi kara damana avasthāvēdī
minisā (tigæssī) meyaṭa kumak nam sidu vī ætda? (kumak nisā mesē vevlannēda?)’yi vimasanu æta
edinadī eya tama kāraṇāvan (siyalla) dænum denu æta
mandayat (mesēma) obagē deviyan vahī magin tamanṭa niyōga kaḷēya (yayi kiyanu æta)
edinadī minisun (hon̆da hō naraka hō) tamangē vipat dakinu piṇisa (vividha koṭas vaśayen khedī) samūha samūhayan vaśayen (viniścaya san̆dahā) pæmiṇenu æta
ebævin kavurun ek anu pramāṇayak hō pinak kara tibuṇē nam, ohu (ehidī) eya dæka gannēya
(esēma) kavurun ek anu pramāṇayak hō pāpayak kara tibunēda eyada ohu (ehidī) dæka gannēya
